Feed The Mind. Feed The Soul.

Dedicated to showcasing the finest spoken word and live music in the U.K.

View Events
See the artistry

Paving the way for the big artists of tomorrow.

Providing high quality from beginning to end. The talent captivates you right up until the final few minutes of the event. For many artists our stage has been part of the journey to mainstream success; JP Cooper, Jacob Banks, Shakka, Cythnia Erivo and Ray BLK, to name a few.

An event that stays with you longer than the bus ride home.

An event that not only entertains, but also unearths and invigorates passion in the hearts of those who attend, encouraging them to follow their own dreams as a result of being immersed in the artistry on stage.

Relationships are born beyond the stage.

An environment where people of different backgrounds and walks of life can come together with a common purpose. The perfect setting to meet like-minded individuals with a shared love for music and poetry.
